name: Boy Subway Runner
description:
Anytime, anywhere, Super Boy Runner On The Subway must go on. You can still play Super Boy Runner On The Subway offline without internet access. Super Boy Runner On The Subway is an endless running game. Get more and more coins as you can. Collect coins to upgrade your favorite character. You can upgrade boy and girl character with coins

Super Boy Runner On The Subway Features:

• Colorful and HD graphics

• Double tap for skateboard, feeling the special running

• Rush as fast as you can

• Amazing background music.

• Get more and more coins

• More characters to choose
